channel.title: [pi] run.bat error
channel.description: i got this error in my run.bat i dunno what it means tho [code][04/02/12 21:52]: USERNAME - actionbutton: 107243 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: requested 32756 bytes for ChunkPool::allocate. Out of swap space? # # Internal Error (allocation.cpp:117), pid=5208, tid=6624 # Error: ChunkPool::allocate # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-x86 ) # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\***\Desktop\FOLDERNAME\MYSERVERNAME source\hs_err_pid5208.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . . [/code] any help will be appreciated thanks

item.title: [pi] run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

It’s at 1000 ATM
How high can it go?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

All it’s saying is that it’s running out of memory, so it’s crashing itself to prevent a crash (sounds weird).
Try editing your Run.bat and find the ’ -Xmx512m ’ (it might be a different number than 512, but just change it to something higher than it is.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
